alert.note: Alert for Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 19 at 2:32PM MDT until April 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 11 AM to 9 PM today for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, and 224 through 237 which includes the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo an Wet Mountains, Fremont and Teller Counties, and all of the eastern plains... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 12 PM to 8 PM Wednesday afternoon and evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221...222...224...225...AND 229...which includes the San Luis valley, the Sangre De Cristos and Wet Mountains, Fremont, Teller, and Huerfano counties... ...A Fire Weather Watch remains in effect for Wednesday afternoon and evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 227... and 228... which include southern El Paso and Pueblo Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 227 AND 228... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 227 AND 228... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 227 and 228. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Timing...For Tuesday, from 11 AM to 9 PM. For Wednesday, noon until 8 PM. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs
